FAQ / Wave 4 / Battle Cards /
View On FortressMaximus.io

Coup

  1. If the character that was KO’d has was one of my characters with a Bounty ability, can I use that ability? [Source: WotC]
    No. That character is no longer on the battlefield when Coup’s ability is uses.
